item.description: Journal Publications #: First author ✝: corresponding author Jian Ren#, Yazi Huang#, Yeqing Ren#, Tianqi Tu, Baoshan Qiu, Daosheng Ai, Zhanying Bi, Xue Bai, Fengzhi Li, Jun-Liszt Li ¶, Xing-jun Chen, Ziyan Feng, Zongpei Guo, Jianfeng Lei, An Tian, Ziwei Cui, Volkhard Lindner, Ralf H Adams, Yibo Wang, Fei Zhao, Jakob Körbelin, Wenzhi Sun, Yilong Wang, Hongqi Zhang, Tao Hong✝, Woo-ping Ge✝ (2023/03/30) Somatic variants of MAP3K3 are sufficient to cause cerebral and spinal cord cavernous malformations.
